Reviews.Title: “Poor Quality”
Reviews.Author: CharlieVVancouver
Reviews.Content: frequent traveler seek holiday inn express hotels quality recent experience desk clerk failed recognize loyalty priority experience continued total lack ice entire fourstory hotel vending machines inoperable change desk purchase water obtain ice excellent cleanliness parking slim car inches elevator times day forcing walk flights thankfully final day bring bags attempting check 430 am night clerk demanded prepaid suggested check record discovered prepaid receipt confidence level low ebb hotel below holiday inn express standards

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel with a personal touch...”

Reviews.Content: staff hie mira mesa blvd phenominal wearing smile accomodate charge 34 marines stayed hotel hotel staff stayed hotel entire month day immaculately cleaned breakfast perfect coffee fresh manager charge reservations understanding phone stay comfortable thank marines sc

Reviews.Title: “Best Holiday Inn Express in San Diego County”
Reviews.Author: traveler10111
Reviews.Content: stayed days trip san diego loved hotel location downtown north carlsbad legoland nice clean spacious recently upgraded granite countertops nice lcd flat panel tvs free wifi hotel serves complimentary breakfast eating staff friendly nice definately recommend hotel traveling san diego mira mesa business pleasure services hotel rates

Reviews.Content: foremost hotel freeway highway getting city convenient staff especially front desk friendly check check fast easy spacious clean furnished ref microwave hair dryer coffee maker beds comfortable sleep slept smoke alarm middle night battery changed clean parking lot somewhat crowded night shared parking lots quality inn suites door dennys difficult parking spots complimentary breakfast hot foods served biscuit gravy bacon sausage eggs warm cinnamon rolls stay overall stay pleasant hotel expensive hotel stayed las vegas definitely recommend hotel family friends
